Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\helpers\Security

All Classes | Methods | Constants
Inheritanceyii\helpers\Security » yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
Available since version2.0
Source Code
Security provides a set of methods to handle common security-related tasks.

In particular, Security supports the following features:

  • Encryption/decryption: encrypt() and decrypt()
  • Data tampering prevention: hashData() and validateData()
  • Password validation: generatePasswordHash() and validatePassword()

Additionally, Security provides getSecretKey() to support generating named secret keys. These secret keys, once generated, will be stored in a file and made available in future requests.

Public Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
encrypt() Encrypts data. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
decrypt() Decrypts data yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
hashData() Prefixes data with a keyed hash value so that it can later be detected if it is tampered. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
validateData() Validates if the given data is tampered. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
getSecretKey() Returns a secret key associated with the specified name. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
generateRandomKey() Generates a random key. The key may contain uppercase and lowercase latin letters, digits, underscore, dash and dot. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
generatePasswordHash() Generates a secure hash from a password and a random salt. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
validatePassword() Verifies a password against a hash. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity

Protected Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
addPadding() Adds a padding to the given data (PKCS #7). yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
stripPadding() Strips the padding from the given data. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
deriveKey() Derives a key from the given password (PBKDF2). yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
openCryptModule() Opens the mcrypt module. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
generateSalt() Generates a salt that can be used to generate a password hash. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity

Constants

Hide inherited constants

ConstantValueDescriptionDefined By
CRYPT_BLOCK_SIZE 16 Uses AES, block size is 128-bit (16 bytes). yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
CRYPT_KEY_SIZE 24 Uses AES-192, key size is 192-bit (24 bytes). yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
DERIVATION_HASH 'sha256' Uses SHA-256. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
DERIVATION_ITERATIONS 1000 Uses 1000 iterations. yii\helpers\BaseSecurity
